channel.title: Need some serious Port fowarding help
channel.description: I cant get my damn ports to open : (. Ive tried multiple guides. I fowarded the ports on the computer that the router is hooked up to. And I fowarded the ports through the firewall on my computer (The computer connected to the internet wirelessly) . And It Still wont let people connect and is telling me my ports are not fowarded. What is wrong?

item.title: Need some serious Port fowarding help
item.dc:creator: @kookajamo kookajamo
item.description:
@kookajamo wrote:

I have UnNp Or w/;e enabled but The program says i dont =/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2009, 02:01:20 pm[/size][hr][quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:291074”]If all else fails, try downloading BAUPnP. It’s an automatic portforwarder, assuming your router is UPnP enabled. But some routers are picky.[/quote] Any other ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Need some serious Port fowarding help

item.title: Need some serious Port fowarding help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If all else fails, try downloading BAUPnP. It’s an automatic portforwarder, assuming your router is UPnP enabled. But some routers are picky.

Read full topic
